contextual_notes: The user appears to be in the early stages of exploring care options and is unsure about how to articulate their needs.
There is a recurring theme of the user needing time and space to clarify their thoughts.
general_insights: Users may benefit from structured guidance when expressing complex needs, especially in sensitive areas like healthcare.
Providing reassurance and breaking down tasks into manageable steps can help users who feel overwhelmed.
